hero_image.alt: Hero image for Duty of Care for Maintenance Managers in Australia: Legal Liability, Due Diligence, and the Digital Shield

image_prompt: A hyper-realistic, cinematic wide shot inside a modern Australian manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a diverse group of maintenance professionals (men and women) are wearing standard Australian PPE: high-visibility orange and yellow vests with reflective strips, white hard hats, and safety glasses. One technician is holding a rugged tablet, but the screen is facing away from the camera. They are looking at a large industrial motor connected to a conveyor belt. The background is slightly blurred but shows a clean, organized factory floor with yellow safety walkways. The lighting is bright and industrial, with a cool blue hue emphasizing technology and safety. No text or words in the image. The atmosphere conveys professionalism, safety, and technological control.
